title: Syrians displaced by quakes fear cholera outbreak as cases surge
description: At least two people died in northwest Syria last month following a rise in cholera infections.

title: US issues more Iran sanctions amid stalled diplomacy
description: New measures target Iranian oil and petrochemical sales, as US says it is committed to reducing Iran's energy exports.

title: Argentina to renew push for sovereignty over Falkland Islands
description: The South American country hopes to bring the question of the islands' disputed sovereignty before the United Nations.

title: US Justice Dept wants execs to foot bill for corporate misconduct
description: DOJ will give discounts on fines for companies that seek to claw back compensation from corporate wrongdoers.

title: US Justice Department says Trump can be sued for January 6
description: Former president has argued for presidential immunity in cases that seek to link his actions to the 2021 Capitol riot.

title: How violence robs Nigerians of their votes
description: Violent groups have been used by established political parties in Nigeria for decades to influence the voting process.

title: Pakistan mourns death of star athlete in shipwreck off Italy
description: Shahida Raza represented Pakistan in football, hockey and martial arts in several international championships.

title: Divisions roil Iranian-American protest movement
description: The appearance of a former SAVAK official at a US rally has underscored schisms within the Iranian diaspora.

title: US faces growing call to deny entry to Israel’s Bezalel Smotrich
description: Rights groups are urging Washington to deny entry to Israeli minister who called for wiping out a Palestinian village.

title: Has the G20 meeting produced solutions or more divisions?
description: Gathering of world's biggest economies overshadowed by war in Ukraine rather than what was on host India's agenda.

title: California drought levels recede in the face of winter storms
description: About half of the state has been lifted out of drought conditions by a series of storms that have drenched the region.

title: US labour market continues to be strong
description: Labour market resilience & stubbornly high inflation have increased odds the Fed will continue to raise interest rates.

title: Chinese, Indian foreign ministers discuss border peace at G20
description: The relationship between New Delhi and Beijing has been tense since deadly clashes along their border in 2020.

title: Libya approves constitutional changes in move towards elections
description: UN envoy has described the amendment as 'controversial within the Libyan political class and general citizenry'.

title: ‘A Colombian Wild West’: Inside Maicao’s Arab community
description: Maicao, once the thriving heart of Colombia’s Arab community, faces population decline amid a slowing border economy.

title: Peter Obi says he will prove he won Nigeria election
description: Defeated candidate Peter Obi pledges to legally challenge the results a day after Bola Ahmed Tinubu was declared winner.

description: In Iskenderun, Turkey, train carriages have been turned into temporary shelters for last month's earthquake survivors.

title: India’s G20 meeting ends without consensus on Russia-Ukraine war

title: Macron says era of French interference in Africa is ‘over’

title: Pakistani rupee hits record low amid IMF bailout delay

title: Russia accuses Ukraine of cross-border attack in Bryansk
description: Moscow says Ukrainian saboteurs opened fire against civilians on Russian territory, a claim Kyiv denies.

description: Here's a round-up of Al Jazeera's Middle East coverage this week.

title: Biden’s asylum ban: The view from the Darién Gap
description: As the Darién becomes an ever more populated graveyard, it’s safe to say Biden is going down a very wrong path.

title: Stop all financial aid to Tunisia until it returns to democracy
description: If global powers are genuinely concerned about Saeid's attacks on democracy, they should stop bankrolling his regime.

title: India top court orders probe into allegations against Adani Group
description: Court asks market regulator to investigate possible lapses in securities law or other regulatory disclosures by group.

title: A year on, what do young Russians think of the war in Ukraine?

description: At least 46 people were killed when a passenger train collided head-on with a cargo train outside the city of Larissa.

title: Closed borders put cancer patients in Idlib at risk

title: Free-falling rial leaves Iranians worried about financial future
description: Currency depreciation and high inflation show few signs of coming down, forcing many Iranians to make fewer purchases.

title: North Korea’s Kim says ‘nothing impossible’ amid agriculture push

title: California panel rejects parole again for Robert Kennedy assassin
description: Lawyer for Sirhan Sirhan has accused the panel of bending to the will of California's governor, who opposes his parole.

title: Prosecutors present closing argument in Murdaugh murder case
description: The closely watched trial centres on Alex Murdaugh, a former South Carolina lawyer accused of killing his wife and son.
